participant_1.background:
I once pretended to be a tour guide to escape a speeding ticket.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.

I like to check out the latest aviation news and ballet events on my favorite websites.
i m tired of having to read subtitles.
I'm moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection.
i am an animal rights activist.
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from a ballet performance.
Oh that sounds fun! I've never been to a ballet before.
You should go! It's a really beautiful experience.
I might have to check it out sometime. What's your favorite ballet?
I like Swan Lake the best. It's so graceful and elegant.
That sounds like something I would enjoy.
You should definitely check it out!
I will!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, go hiking, and spend time with friends and family.
Those sound like fun things to do! I like to read, play video games, and go to the movies.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in aviation and ballet.
That's cool! I've never read any books about aviation.
You should check out some! They're really interesting.
I will!
What do you like about hiking?
I like being outdoors and getting exercise. I also like seeing new places.
That's awesome! I love being outdoors too.
Me too!
It's a beautiful day outside. Do you want to go for a walk?
Sure! That sounds like fun.
